author: @guillegiraldoyt
text: I really liked this tutorial! Good example, goals and presenter.  I just want to encourage you to make good use of Object Oriented Programming. It is more than a mere convenience like the way you used it in this code. I say this because you are mixing OOP with procedural, and this is bad. No need to dive deep in concepts to make good use of good object oriented programming, and leave a correct base for anyone using your tutorial and code.  You could really improve your code organization and modularization, and teach new programmers the right way!  Hope you do well, and thanks for the tutorial.
